attributes.action: Re-recognise Sept each year as Battle of Britain Day and create a new Bank Holiday on the Monday after 15th Sept.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As 11th November is known Nationally as Armistice Day, we the undersigned call upon the PM to officially designate the 15th September as Battle of Britain Day. Also, the proposed new Bank Holiday could be on the Monday after 15th Sept. Please act now as a tribute to the 544 Allied Airmen who made the ultimate sacrifice and as a tribute to "The Few"
